name: Mason Jar® Soup
description: Mason jar® soups are like your meal prep BFF’s—they’re there when you need them. Prep a few of these bad boys at the beginning of the week for some grab ‘n go lunches, then just add water! Don’t be afraid to customize the protein and veggies based on what you have in your fridge. No matter what ingredients you’re choosing, our vegan Better Than Beef Broth will make sure your lunch is always delish.

ingredients.name: diced, firm tofu or cooked protein

preparation: In a 500-ml mason jar®, layer in diced veggies, tofu, then rice noodles (you will need to fold them to fit them in the jar). Sprinkle in broth mix and soy sauce.
Secure lid; store in the fridge until ready to eat.
Pour boiling water into mason jar (it should cover the ingredients). Secure lid. Using oven mitts, carefully shake the mason jar®. Let sit 7 min, or until noodles are cooked.
tips: Customize your veggies! Choose your faves or whatever you have on hand. You should have about 3⁄4 cups diced veggies.

products.name: Better Than Beef Broth Mix
summary: You won’t believe it’s not beef! This vegan/plant-based broth mix is packed with beefy flavor, mushroom and inactive nutritional yeast powders, and organic tamari powder. Ready in minutes, this one-step broth creates a rich base for your favorite soups and can be used anywhere you want to “beef” things up!
